ruling: - If you Tribute Summon [[Thestalos the Firestorm Monarch]] successfully, and your opponent discards a monster like [[Outstanding Dog Marron]] or [[Regenerating Mummy]], you still inflict damage because the monster was discarded to the Graveyard (even though it doesn't remain there).
- If [[Banisher of the Light]] is face-up on the field, no damage is inflicted because the card is not discarded to the Graveyard.
- This card's effect always activates when Tribute Summoned, even if your opponent has no cards in their hand.
